website_summaries.verdict: Your child can use this lounger-style pillowbed for years to come.
pros: Folds into floor lounger seat or flat as pillow bed
Can be machine washed on delicate cycle
Easy to fold up and pack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lounger for any situation
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. The cover is super soft and kind of plushy. Definitely made very well. The Mermaid design is super cute. This can be used for an adult or child as it is very large. I bought this for my 9 year old daughter and she absolutely loves it. It is very handy and mobile. You can just kind of fold it all up and take it along wherever. Great for sleep overs, camping, drive in movies, play time and lounging. Did I mention the dogs love it too?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fabulous! My daughter LOVES it and her cousins who are visiting this week want to steal it when they leave. It's even great for an adult to chill on the floor watching tv. The key is to get comfy pillows, which YES does increase the overall cost, but is well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pillow beds.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very clever idea. My granddaughters (4&8) thought they were awesome. They are comfortable & they are very cosy. I like the zippers, they keep the pillows intact, no shifting around. Money well spent! My grown daughter wanted to know if you make adult size?
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made.
customer_reviews.text: The zippers were all workable, the material so very soft, the pattern is as cute as could be and I found this item to be exactly as described in every way. Am ordering more for my grand kids to use when they have sleep-overs.
customer_reviews.author: kuma

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love! These covers are exactly as pictured. Adorable, soft and comfortable fabric. 5 standard pillows fit perfectly inside and were easy to put in. Got for my 15 month old that likes to lounge on the floor and she loves it! My 5 year old wants one as well so I plan to order one for her for Christmas as soon as I know which pattern she likes!
customer_reviews.author: Astra Bafardi

customer_reviews.title: Washable, durable and super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I use this constantly. She is 1 and is in the floor more than on the couch, so we keep this on the ground by the couch. While watching tv we both sit on it together because it’s so big and comfortable. The best part is that I can take all the pillows (that you have to buy separate, only con) and throw it in the wash. I’ve washed ours several times and it’s still doing great.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Whitmire

customer_reviews.title: Sleep mat
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it!. It’s well made and actually thicker and better than I imagined it to be. It’s great for overnight visits with the grandparents 😉. I definitely recommend this even my 14 year old said it was comfy. We ordered the King and it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Biz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Super cute and soft. The king size is the perfect size for grown ups as well as kids. (Ages 6 and 10)
customer_reviews.author: AER

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a tall 7 year old and this is plenty long for her to comfortably lay on. I got one for each of my children and they both love having their own "mat" to lounge on while watching TV or reading a book. I highly recommend this as a gift or prize for your children.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST Birthday Party Favor
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was perfect for my daughter’s 10th sleepover birthday party! All the girls loved getting the pillow as a keepsake!
customer_reviews.author: Edna M. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Love!! Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves hers! She got it for a birthday gift and now my other daughters want one :)
customer_reviews.author: Toni T

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Durable. Soft. Just what I was hoping it would be.
customer_reviews.author: David Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Has been through several washes already due to accidents. Easy to take out the pillows. No signs of wear other than where the dog got ahold of the corner :/. Super soft and I love the sea/mermaid pattern. Makes sleeping on the floor comfortable, fits in our blanket forts. We also like to fold part of it into a chair for reading time too. My 7 year old adores it and uses it every night. We ordered the king size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for when you don’t have an extra bed for sleeping over at grandmas/ camping in the living room for movie night.
customer_reviews.author: Cydney

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the $ it's only a case you could buy a sheet and it's the same thing verry disappointed don't wast your money
customer_reviews.author: Rs4 driver

customer_reviews.title: my only complaint is that it isn't easy to store away
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this pillow bed, my only complaint is that it isn't easy to store away... wish it had a ribbon or cord to tie it together for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie P

customer_reviews.title: Order same pillow in size and comfort
customer_reviews.text: So awsome cute ,i got the larger one . Larger pillpws .soft and easy clean .My daught been using for year now still great condition . Zipper easy prottects the pillows
customer_reviews.author: LIV

customer_reviews.title: Happy grandkids / Happy grandmother
customer_reviews.text: it was a birthday gift for my six yr old grand daughter. She loves it. Her 9 yr old cousin likes it so much she wants one for her birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: She likes the design and how soft it is. I just roll it up and stash it in my closet until the next visit.
customer_reviews.author: Nita Intindola

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and amazingly fluffy and supportive once pillows are added. Colors are vibrant and material is plush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and big enough for an adult to lounge ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and big enough for an adult to lounge on. My 3 year old loves it. She only needs 3 pillows to fit her size then she folds over the leftover fabric as a blanket. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: under the sea
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS AMAZING BUT ITS A HASSLE TO FOLD UP AND STORE IT. BUT DEFF WORTH UR MONEY FOR KIDS WHO CAN USE IT FOR READING HOMEWORK NAPPING ITS NICE
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 yr old granddaughter for her bday. It was a hit. She loved it. All the kids there loved it and asked for one. Will be ordering 3 more for Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for our 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for our 6 year old. Not only does she love to use it to watch tv, she also loves to use it in ever bed as well. The material is so soft and very easy to insert king size pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee M. Sieczka

customer_reviews.title: You need to buy pillows but we love it
customer_reviews.text: But consider to add in your budget the need to buy pillows
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Aranguren

customer_reviews.title: Its a little long but its very comfortable for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: The material is very soft and colorful. Its a little long but its very comfortable for my daughter.I think its a Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Super soft pillow cover
customer_reviews.text: My husband and daughter love the pillow. The fabric is super soft and very comfy,
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable. I’m using it as a sleeping surface every ...
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable. I’m using it as a sleeping surface every night due to my child having seizures, I need to be close to her so I put this on the floor. I will say if you’re going to get great sleep you need to use king size pillows instead of standard or you’ll get big gaps. With that said, it’s not even intended for an adult to use it as a primary bed but it’s held up well! Easily fold it up and put it on the twin bed during the day. It would be great for camping, movie nights, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these are amazing! Great product for the price. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Brown

product_meta.title: Butterfly Craze Kid's Floor Pillow Bed Cover - Use as Nap Mat, Portable Toddler Bed Alternative for Sleepovers, Travel, Napping, or as a Lounger for Reading, Playing. Cover Only!
